alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 1:46PM EDT until July 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Aroostook County in northern Maine... North central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 145 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shin Pond, or 10 miles north of Patten, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mount Chase, Shin Pond, northeastern Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Merrill, Dyer Brook, Hersey, Moro Plantation and Webbertown. This includes State Highway 11 near Knowles Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
